engrams.name: Beeswax
engrams.description: Natural wax produced by honey bees. A very effective binding agent with many uses.

engrams.name: Honey
engrams.description: Sweet food made by bees foraging nectar from flowers. Bees must be kept in an apiary to produce honey.

engrams.name: Baked Bread Loaf
engrams.description: Sates your hunger, and provides health while being digested.

engrams.name: Baked Honey Loaf
engrams.description: Sates your hunger, and provides health while being digested.

engrams.name: Cooked Bacon
engrams.description: Sates your hunger, and provides health while being digested. More effective than normal meat. Wild carnivores like this meat a lot.

engrams.name: Cooked Fish Fillet
engrams.description: A very nutritious fillet of fish.

engrams.name: Cooked Poultry
engrams.description: Sates your hunger, and provides health while being digested. More effective than normal meat. Wild carnivores like this meat a lot.

engrams.name: Cooked Spare Ribs
engrams.description: Sates your hunger, and provides health while being digested. More effective than normal meat. Wild carnivores like this meat a lot.

engrams.name: Organic Oil (from fat)
engrams.description: Oil made from heating animal fat. Less dense than oil harvested from the sea.

engrams.name: Cooked Spare Ribs

engrams.name: Organic Oil (from fat)
engrams.description: Oil made from heating animal fat. Less dense than oil harvested from the sea.

engrams.name: Jam of Amarberry
engrams.description: A jam of amarberry that has been preserved with sugar.

engrams.name: Jam of Azulberry
engrams.description: A jam of azulberry that has been preserved with sugar.

engrams.name: Jam of Mejoberry
engrams.description: A jam of mejoberry that has been preserved with sugar.

engrams.name: Jam of Tintoberry
engrams.description: A jam of tintoberry that has been preserved with sugar.

engrams.name: Cooked Rice
engrams.description: Cooked Rice that can be combined with other consumables.

engrams.name: Cup of Coffee
engrams.description: This fresh cup of coffee refreshes your body like an oasis. Consume it to gain increased hyperthermic insulation, and slow your rate of food consumption. Effects last 15 minutes.

engrams.name: Cup of Tea
engrams.description: This fresh cup of tea refreshes your body like an oasis. Consume it to gain increased hyperthermic insulation, and slow your rate of water consumption. Effects last 15 minutes.

engrams.name: Cane Sugar
engrams.description: Refined sugar made from a sugarcane plant and boiling over a cauldron.

engrams.name: Cashew Milk
engrams.description: Soft clay that has been heated in a forge to make hard brick.

engrams.name: Cup of Malt
engrams.description: Made from dried barley and boiling water. Used for alcoholic beverages.

engrams.name: Natural Yeast
engrams.description: Made from dough at a baking station. Used for baking various goods.

engrams.name: Fresh Cement
engrams.description: Fresh cement that cen [sic] be formed into and used to build larger structures.

engrams.name: Canteen
engrams.description: Safely carries a sizable amount of water, and is reasonably lightweight.

engrams.name: Concrete Dinosaur Gate
engrams.description: A large, reinforced wooden gate that can be used with a Gateway to keep dinosaurs in or out.

engrams.name: Baker's Oven
engrams.description: Perfect for baking delicious edibles!

engrams.name: Cauldron
engrams.description: Must contain basic fuel to light the fire. Put various ingredients with water in this to make soups, stews, and dyes.

engrams.name: Cooking Station
engrams.description: Used to convert raw resources into bakeable items!

engrams.name: Fermenting Barrel
engrams.description: Combine malt as fuel with various items to make fermented beverages.

engrams.name: Primitive Grill
engrams.description: Perfect for cooking meat in bulk, staying warm, and providing light. Must use crude oil as a fuel source.

engrams.name: Cement Mixer
engrams.description: Before making cement structures, the cement must be mixed.

engrams.name: Fruit Press
engrams.description: Used to convert berries into juice. This juice may be combines with other resources or drank on its own for its nutritional value.

engrams.name: Grindstone
engrams.description: This simple stone contraption can be used to grind resources into new substances.

engrams.name: Handmill
engrams.description: This simple stone contraption can be used to grind resources into new substances.

engrams.name: Modular Table
engrams.description: Place items on this sturdy table (M&P, Lantern)

engrams.name: Oil Tank
engrams.description: A large machine that stores large amounts of oil.

engrams.name: Apiary
engrams.description: The best place to put bees. Provides honey and beeswax over time when bees are present.

engrams.name: Meat Preserving Shed
engrams.description: Burns sparkpowder at low temperatures to dehydrate food and kill bacteria. Keeps perishables from spoiling for a longer time.

engrams.name: Smokehouse
engrams.description: Burns sparkpowder at low temperatures to dehydrate food and kill bacteria. Keeps perishables from spoiling for a long time.

engrams.name: Brazier
engrams.description: Increased heating and light radius!

engrams.name: Lumber Dinosaur Gate
engrams.description: A large, reinforced wooden gate that can be used with a Gateway to keep dinosaurs in or out.

engrams.name: Lumber Dinosaur Gateway
engrams.description: A large lumber and stone gateway that can be used with a Gate to keep most dinosaurs in or out.

engrams.name: Steel Pillar
engrams.description: This steel-plated concrete pillar adds structural integrity to the area it is build [sic] under. Can also act as stilts for buildings on inclines.

engrams.name: Steel Safebox
engrams.description: A steel box to store valuables in.

engrams.name: Steel Water Tower
engrams.description: Attach this to pipes to store rain, irrigation, or manually deposited water for later use. Will automatically irrigate nearby crops if attached to a tap. Stores a large amount of water!

engrams.name: Steel Handrail
engrams.description: A sturdy steel handrail for decorative purposes.

engrams.name: Tudor Bar
engrams.description: A wooden bar to enjoy drinks with friends!

engrams.name: Tudor Bar (L Shaped)
engrams.description: A wooden bar to enjoy drinks with friends!

engrams.name: Water Well
engrams.description: Stores large amounts of rain water for later use. Cannot be attached to irrigation systems.

engrams.name: Lantern
engrams.description: An oil lantern used to place on a market stall for night-time vending!

engrams.name: Pontoon Bridge
engrams.description: A primitive floating bridge that can be placed in water.

engrams.name: Table Lantern
engrams.description: An oil lantern used to place on a modular table night-time light!

engrams.name: APS Mailbox
engrams.description: Mailbox for the Federated Postal Service of ARK.

engrams.name: Firewood Holder
engrams.description: Store bulk amounts of firewood and convert fresh firewood to dry firewood.

engrams.name: Miner's Box
engrams.description: Bulk storage for stone, metal, flint, and ingots.

engrams.name: Modern Hanging Shelf
engrams.description: Store various items.

engrams.name: Modern Storage Shelf
engrams.description: Store bulk amounts of any item.

engrams.name: Modern Storage Shelf (Fiber)
engrams.description: Store bulk amounts of any item.

engrams.name: Wood Storage Shed
engrams.description: Store bulk amounts of wood and thatch.

engrams.name: Chicken and Rice
engrams.description: A meal that is so filling, it reduces your hunger for a short period.

engrams.name: Fillet and Bread
engrams.description: A meal that is so filling, it reduces your hunger for a short period.

engrams.name: Prime Salad
engrams.description: A meal that is so filling, it reduces your hunger for a short period.

engrams.name: Salad
engrams.description: A meal that is so filling, it reduces your hunger for a short period.

engrams.name: Fresh Dough
engrams.description: Fresh dough made from flour on the baking station.

engrams.name: Canteen
engrams.description: Safely carries a sizable amount of water, and is reasonably lightweight.

engrams.name: Braggot Mead
engrams.description: Alcoholic mead made from honey and malt.

engrams.name: Fermented Wine
engrams.description: Wine courage!! Consume it do deal increased melee damage, and gain extra stamina regen. Effects last 15 minutes.

engrams.name: Wheat Beer
engrams.description: Beer muscles!! Consume it to deal increased melee damage, and gain extra stamina regen. Effects last 15 minutes.

engrams.name: Amarberry Juice
engrams.description: Amarberry juice made on the fruit press. Great for restoring your energy reserves!

engrams.name: Azulberry Juice
engrams.description: Azulberry juice made on the fruit press. Great for restoring your energy reserves!

engrams.name: Mejoberry Juice
engrams.description: Mejoberry juice made on the fruit press. Great for restoring your energy reserves!

engrams.name: Stimbull Juice
engrams.description: Stimbull juice made on the fruit press. The best drink for restoring your energy reserves!

engrams.name: Tintoberry Juice
engrams.description: Tintoberry juice made on the fruit press. Great for restoring your energy reserves!

engrams.name: Tomato Juice
engrams.description: Tomato juice made on the fruit press. Great for restoring your vitality!

engrams.name: Fresh Sugar Juice Bucket
engrams.description: Sugar juice pressed on the sugar press. Must be used with cauldron to make sugar.

engrams.name: Grape Juice
engrams.description: Grape juice made on the fruit press. Can be used to make wine.

engrams.name: BattleAxe
engrams.description: A mighty axe used for serious battles!

engrams.name: Viking Axe
engrams.description: A mighty battle axe wielded by the toughest of foes.

engrams.name: Ground Cashew
engrams.description: Ground cashew can be used to make cashew milk. [sic]

engrams.name: Bonemeal Fertilizer
engrams.description: Bonemeal is a mixture of finely and coarsely ground animal bones and slaughter-house waste products. It is mainly used as an organic fertilizer for plants.

engrams.name: Clay
engrams.description: Clay that has been formed from grinding claystone and limestone on a handmill.

engrams.name: Organic Oil (from seeds)
engrams.description: Oil made from grinding plant seed. Less dense than oil harvested from the sea.

engrams.name: Sack of Flour
engrams.description: Refined flour made from wheat and a handmill.

engrams.name: Salt
engrams.description: Refined salt made from crystal and a grain wheel.

engrams.name: Brick
engrams.description: Soft clay that has been heated in a forge to make hard brick.

engrams.name: Glass
engrams.description: Glass that has been heated in a forge to make a clear surface.

engrams.name: Iron Ingot
engrams.description: Created by refining iron ore in a forge.

engrams.name: Steel Ingot
engrams.description: Created by refining iron ore and carbon in a forge.

engrams.name: Cooked Bacon
engrams.description: Sates your hunger, and provides health while being digested. More effective than normal meat. Wild carnivores like this meat a lot.

engrams.name: Cooked Fish Fillet
engrams.description: A very nutritious fillet of fish.

engrams.name: Cooked Poultry
engrams.description: Sates your hunger, and provides health while being digested. More effective than normal meat. Wild carnivores like this meat a lot.

engrams.name: Cooked Spare Ribs
engrams.description: Sates your hunger, and provides health while being digested. More effective than normal meat. Wild carnivores like this meat a lot.

engrams.name: Fresh Firewood
engrams.description: If this firewood is left to dry, it will have a longer burning time.

engrams.name: Wood Plank
engrams.description: Timber that is flat, elongated, and rectangular mainly used in construction.

engrams.name: Cured Bacon
engrams.description: This bacon still needs to be put on an open fire before eating.

engrams.name: Cured Bacon
engrams.description: This bacon still needs to be put on an open fire before eating.

engrams.name: Dried Barley
engrams.description: Barley that's been dried for the purpose of making malt!

engrams.name: Dried Tea Bags
engrams.description: Tea thats [sic] been dried. This crop can be harvested for a delicious drink, or combines with other ingredients to make recipes.

engrams.name: Dried Tobacco
engrams.description: May be rolled with a note. When you're having on [sic] of those days.

engrams.name: Dried Wheat
engrams.description: Harvested from a wheat plant and dried on a preserving hut. It can be used to make flour.

engrams.name: Brick
engrams.description: Soft clay that has been heated in a forge to make hard brick.

engrams.name: Glass
engrams.description: Glass that has been heated in a forge to make a clear surface.

engrams.name: Iron Ingot
engrams.description: Created by refining iron ore in a forge.

engrams.name: Steel Ingot
engrams.description: Created by refining iron ore and carbon in a forge.

engrams.name: Cigarette
engrams.description: When you're having one of those days! Drastically reduces hunger but increses [sic] oxygen consumption. Effects last 30 minutes.

engrams.name: Rowboat
engrams.description: A floating wooden platform that you can pilot across the water. Can support the weight of structures and be built on.

engrams.name: Sailboat
engrams.description: A boat you can pilot across the water. Faster than your average raft.

engrams.name: Fish Bait
engrams.description: Lure for the fishing trap.

engrams.name: Trap Bait
engrams.description: Lure for the deadfall trap.

engrams.name: Simple Hammock
engrams.description: Thatch may not make the most comfortable mattress, but this bed acts as a respawn point for you and your Tribe.

engrams.name: Teepee
engrams.description: Like a bed, this will allow your tribe a universal spawn point. But unlike a bed, no foundation required [sic]

engrams.name: Brick Doorframe
engrams.description: A traditional brick wall that provides entrance to a structure.

engrams.name: Brick Wall
engrams.description: A brick-and-mortar styled wall that provides the most protection.

engrams.name: Brick Windowframe
engrams.description: A traditional brick wall with a hole for a window.

engrams.name: Sloped Brick Wall Left
engrams.description: A sturdy brick sloped wall that provides protection. Used in conjuction with the roof.

engrams.name: Sloped Brick Wall Right
engrams.description: A sturdy brick sloped wall that provides protection. Used in conjuction with the roof.

engrams.name: Concrete Foundation
engrams.description: A foundation is required to build in an area. This one is made from traditional concrete.

engrams.name: Concrete Pillar
engrams.description: Adds structural integrity to the area it is build {sic} on. Can also act as stilts for buildings on inclines.

engrams.name: Concrete Ramp
engrams.description: An inclined concrete floor for travelling up or down levels. Can also be used to make an angled roof.

engrams.name: Lumber Pillar
engrams.description: Adds structural integrity to the area it is built on. Can also act as stilts for buildings on inclines.

engrams.name: Big Bonfire
engrams.description: The biggest and safest fire you can make. Requires a form of wood or crude oil as a fuel source.

engrams.name: Big Campfire
engrams.description: Perfect for cooking meat, staying warm, and providing light. Increased heat and light radius! Must use a form of wood as a fuel source.

engrams.name: Candles
engrams.description: Perfect for cooking meat, staying warm, and providing light. Increased heat and light radius.

engrams.name: Preserving Campfire
engrams.description: A primitive way of preserving meat and drying crops. Must use sparkpowder or a form of oil as a fuel source.

engrams.name: Construction Table
engrams.description: Place materials along with blueprints in this to create tools.

engrams.name: Lumber Station
engrams.description: A station to convert wood longs to planks and beams.

engrams.name: Well Bucket
engrams.description: This bucket is used like a tap to gain access to a Water Well.

engrams.name: Lumber Bench
engrams.description: A simpleand [sic] stylish wooden bench for group sitting.

engrams.name: Lumber Chair
engrams.description: A simple wooden bench for solo sitting.

engrams.name: Well Chain
engrams.description: A chain to attach to a well for fetching water.

engrams.name: Adobe Ceiling
engrams.description: A stable traditional adobe ceiling that insulates the inside from the outside, and doubles as a floor for higher levels.

engrams.name: Adobe Doorframe
engrams.description: A traditional brick wall that provides entrance to a structure.

engrams.name: Adobe Foundation
engrams.description: A foundation is required to build structures in an area. This one is made from sturdy adobe.

engrams.name: Adobe Wall
engrams.description: A brick-and-mortar wall that provides the most insulation the inside from the outside and separates rooms.

engrams.name: Adobe Windowframe
engrams.description: A traditional brick wall with a hole for a window.

engrams.name: Big Stone Fence
engrams.description: A big brick-and-mortar fence.

engrams.name: Concrete Ceiling
engrams.description: A stable traditional concrete ceiling that insulates the inside from the outside, and doubles as a floor for higher levels.

engrams.name: Lumber Door
engrams.description: A lumber door that provides entrance to a structure. Can be locked for security.

engrams.name: Reinforced Glass Door
engrams.description: A reinforced glass door that provides entrance to structures. Can be locked for security.

engrams.name: Reinforced Glass Window
engrams.description: Reinforced glass window covering to provide protection from projectiles and spying.

engrams.name: Sloped Cement Roof
engrams.description: An inclined cement roof. Slightly different angle than the ramp.

engrams.name: Small Stone Fence
engrams.description: A small brick-and-mortar fence.

engrams.name: Tanning Rack
engrams.description: Use salt and hide to make leather!

engrams.name: Windmill
engrams.description: Mill your custom grains.

engrams.name: Market Stall
engrams.description: This market stall can travel with you. You may place trading crates that can be picked up. The stall itself can also be picked up.

engrams.name: Big Fence - Opening
engrams.description: Used for a long opening in the big wood fence tier. Snappable!

engrams.name: Big Fence - Post
engrams.description: Used as a post section in the big wood fence tier. Snappable!

engrams.name: Big Fence - Section
engrams.description: Used as a section in the big wood fence tier. Snappable!

engrams.name: Left-Sloped Lumber Wall
engrams.description: A sturdy wooden sloped wall that insulates the inside from the outside, seprarates [sic] rooms, and provides structural integrity. Used in conjunction with the roof.

engrams.name: Lumber Ceiling
engrams.description: A stable lumber ceiling that insulates the inside from the outside, and doubles as a floor for higher levels.

engrams.name: Lumber Doorframe
engrams.description: A lumber wall that provides entrance to a structure.

engrams.name: Lumber Foundation
engrams.description: A foundation is required to build structures in an area. This one is made from sturdy lumber.

engrams.name: Lumber Glass Ceiling
engrams.description: A stable glass ceiling that insulates the inside from the outside, and doubles as a floor for higher levels.

engrams.name: Lumber Glass Pane
engrams.description: A lumber wall that provides light.

engrams.name: Lumber Ramp
engrams.description: A reinforced inclined lumber floor for traveling up or down levels.

engrams.name: Lumber Wall
engrams.description: A sturdy lumber wall that insulates the inside from the outside, seprarates [sic] rooms, and provides structural integrity.

engrams.name: Lumber Windowframe
engrams.description: A lumber wall with a hole for a window.

engrams.name: Right-Sloped Lumber Wall
engrams.description: A sturdy lumber sloped wall that insulates the inside from the outside, seprarates [sic] rooms, and provides structural integrity. Used in conjunction with the roof.

engrams.name: Sloped Glass Roof
engrams.description: An inclined glass roof. Slightly different angle than the ramp.

engrams.name: Sloped Lumber Glass Wall Left
engrams.description: A sturdy lumber sloped wall that insulates the inside from the outside, separates rooms, and provides structural integrity. Used in conjunction with the roof.

engrams.name: Sloped Lumber Glass Wall Right
engrams.description: A sturdy lumber sloped wall that insulates the inside from the outside, separates rooms, and provides structural integrity. Used in conjunction with the roof.

engrams.name: Sloped Lumber Roof
engrams.description: An inclined lumber roof. Slightly different angle than the ramp.

engrams.name: Wood Handrail
engrams.description: A sturdy lumber handrail for decorative purposes.

engrams.name: Wooden Arrow Sign
engrams.description: A simple wooden sign with an arrow for a landmark navigation or relaying messages.

engrams.name: Covered Wooden Cabinet
engrams.description: A wooden cabinet that's able to store a limited amount of items.

engrams.name: Storage Barrel
engrams.description: A small barrel to store goods in.

engrams.name: Trading Crate
engrams.description: A small box to trade goods in.

engrams.name: Trading Crate (Bread)
engrams.description: A small box to trade goods in.

engrams.name: Trading Crate (Eggs)
engrams.description: A small box to trade goods in.

engrams.name: Trading Crate (Fruits & Veggies)
engrams.description: A small box to trade goods in.

engrams.name: Weapon Rack
engrams.description: Store your weapons and tools!

engrams.name: Wooden Cabinet
engrams.description: A wooden cabinet that's able to store a limited amount of items.

engrams.name: Feathered Stone Arrow
engrams.description: An advanced arrow with a flint arrowhead and feathers. If it doesn't break, you can recover your ammo.

engrams.name: Flaming Arrow
engrams.description: A flaming arrow made to strike fear in the hearts of your foes.

engrams.name: Obsidian Arrow
engrams.description: Most deadly arrow to be crafted. Made from pure obsidian.

engrams.name: Stone Hunting Knife
engrams.description: Used for gaining extra hide.

engrams.name: Obsidian Spear
engrams.description: A dangerous melee weapon made out of obsidian that can also be thrown. Has a chance to break when used.

engrams.name: Pitchfork
engrams.description: An easily made melee weapon that can also be thrown. Has a chance to break when used. Slightly more damage than a spear.

engrams.name: Flintlock Pistol
engrams.description: This early aged pistol trades accuracy for flexibility.

engrams.name: Musket
engrams.description: This simple single-shot musket is highly accurate, but has a long reload time.

engrams.name: Metal Hammer
engrams.description: A strong metal hammer primarily used for taming dinosaurs.

engrams.name: Metal Machete
engrams.description: A sharp metal machete used for harvesting specialized consumables.

engrams.name: Obsidian Pickaxe
engrams.description: Used to collect specialized stone resources from rocks.

engrams.name: Leather
engrams.description: A thick piece of skin, hacked from a dead animal then cured on a tanning rack.

engrams.name: Sack of Flour
engrams.description: Refined flour made from wheat and a handmill.

engrams.name: Salt
engrams.description: Refined salt made from crystal and a grain wheel.
